Description.Text: Located in two of the most popular areas in the south of Gran Canaria - San Agustin and Amadores the 4-star Gloria Palace San Agustin and Gloria Palace Amadores hotels are noted for their outstanding locations and fantastic views, spaciousness, family-style welcome, their cuisine and their involvement with health through the seawater treatments provided at their renowned thalassotherapy centres. HEALTH AND WELLBEING - Pioneers in health tourism in the Canary Islands, the Gloria Palace Thalasso & Hotels are the best-equipped thalassotherapy centres in Europe. They offer a wide range of treatments based on therapeutic use of the benefits of seawater and sea products such as algae, mud, etc. Your relaxation, beauty and wellbeing are the goals of the professional therapists, who are led by a specialist doctor. Located between the beaches of Puerto Rico and Amadores, Gloria Palace Amadores Thalasso & Hotel is built on a cliff top and integrated into the landscape, providing spectacular views over the ocean from all parts of the hotel. Built in 2004, the hotel boasts one of Europes best-equipped thalassotherapy centres. In just a few years, the elegant surroundings and top class, friendly services have made it one of the most popular hotels in the Island. Various amenities providing by the property are Banquet facilities, Bar, Beauty Salon/Hairdresser, Billiards, Children's facilities, Conference facilities, Gift shop, Gym / Fitness facilities, Laundry service (with charge), Lift / Elevator, Lobby, Parking facilities free, Pets allowed (only dog and with extra charge), Reception, Restaurant, Room service, Safe deposit box, Spa Services (Massage, Facial, Steam Room, etc.),Swimming pool outdoor, Table tennis, Tennis court and tour desk (extra charged). Breakfast Included.

Amadores is a growing tourism area belonging to the municipality of Mogan, just 1 km from the popular area of Puerto Rico and 18 km from "Little Venice", the name by which the town of Puerto de Mogan is affectionately known. There are two very distinct beaches nearby. Playa de Amadores is a calm, white-sand beach with crystal-clear water, ideal for relaxing. The other is a more lively area with a full range of water sports, in Puerto Rico. Both locations have a wide range of leisure, dining and entertainment facilities.

Double Room with Breakfast - All with spectacular sea views. Light, extensive, modern, fully equipped rooms designed to satisfy the requirements of our most demanding guests. Bedroom with adjoining twin beds, lounge area with sofa bed, desk, air-conditioning, telephone, satellite TV, piped music, Internet connection , safe hire and fridge. Mini-bar service available on request (extra charge). Fully-equipped bathroom, bath/shower, two hand basins, separate toilet, hairdryer and make-up mirror. Furnished balcony with sea views Cot available on request at no extra charge.
